title: guy.fawkes
author: guy.fawkes
content: Remember, remember the fifth of November. Today, I, Guy Fawkes announce LibertyTown, a brand new decentralized network that gives people the opportunity to regain our freedom back and conduct anonymous peer-to-peer transactions online. The easiest and most disruptive crypto payment network will be made available to the public on November 9, 2022 23:59:59. The way people trade goods and services online will be changed forever by LibertyTown. Behind this mask there is more than just flesh. Beneath this mask there is an idea... and ideas are bulletproof. We are told to remember the idea, not the man, because a man can fail. He can be caught. He can be killed and forgotten. But four hundred years later, an idea can still change the world. Protocols that are decentralized are unstoppable. LibertyTown is a federative network that will revolutionize online business.https://i.ibb.co/y0SzdbX/liberty-logo.png

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: guy.fawkes on November 05, 2022, 09:53:42 PMRemember, remember the fifth of November. Today, I, Guy Fawkes announce LibertyTown, a brand new decentralized network that gives people the opportunity to regain our freedom back and conduct anonymous peer-to-peer transactions online. The easiest and most disruptive crypto payment network will be made available to the public on November 9, 2022 23:59:59. The way people trade goods and services online will be changed forever by LibertyTown. Behind this mask there is more than just flesh. Beneath this mask there is an idea... and ideas are bulletproof. We are told to remember the idea, not the man, because a man can fail. He can be caught. He can be killed and forgotten. But four hundred years later, an idea can still change the world. Protocols that are decentralized are unstoppable. LibertyTown is a federative network that will revolutionize online business."and ideas are bulletproof."Lmfao... Seriously? Are you a dev?
